lore: The Aurelion Core is a nexus of cosmic consciousness. The Conductor does not command, but rather harmonizes with it, imprinting desires upon the quantum foam. The resulting Echoes are not mere data, but fleeting memories of what could be, given form and orbit.

modules.name: Quantum Resonance Engine
modules.description: Translates conceptual imprints from the Conductor into stable, observable Echoes within the local dataspace.

modules.name: Empathic Feedback Loop
modules.description: Modulates the Core's harmonic state based on the Conductor's focus and intent, altering ambient light and sound.

modules.name: Subconscious Whisper Subsystem
modules.description: Generates emergent insights and suggestions from the Core's vast data stream, manifesting as ephemeral patterns of light and text.
